      • getComponentName

        public java.lang.String getComponentName()
        Returns the name of this component.
        Returns:
        String of this component's name.

      • log

        public boolean log(java.lang.String type,
          java.lang.String message)
        Log a message for this component.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of log to commit (INFO, ERROR, WARNING)
        message - The actual log message.
        Returns:
        True if the send buffer is not full, otherwise False. False means the message with not be sent.

      • count

        public boolean count(java.lang.String counterName,
            long amountToAdd)
        Increment the counter value of counterName. AmountToAdd can be positive or negative. If a counter by the name of counterName cannot be found a new counter is made, initialized at 0.
        Parameters:
        counterName -
        amountToAdd -
        Returns:
        True if the send buffer is not full, otherwise False. False means the message with not be sent.

      • gauge

        public boolean gauge(java.lang.String gaugeName,
            long gaugeValue)
        Set the value of gauge gaugeName. The current value of the gauge will be set to gaugeValue.
        Parameters:
        gaugeName -
        gaugeValue -
        Returns:
        True if the send buffer is not full, otherwise False. False means the message with not be sent.
